info.title: Staminads API
info.description: Web analytics platform for tracking TimeScore metrics

key.description:
The full API key. This is ONLY returned once and is not stored.
Format: stam_live_<64 hex chars>

apiKey.description: Public API key metadata (without the key_hash)

task_id.description: The unique identifier for the backfill task

totalsGroupBy.description:
When set, enables "filtered totals" mode for queries with no dimensions.
The query will:
1. Group by these dimensions in an inner subquery
2. Apply metricFilters via HAVING clause
3. Aggregate the filtered results in an outer query

Use this for totals that should respect metricFilters.
Example: Get total sessions where bounce_rate > 50%, grouped by landing_path.
